name: Lady Bird Johnson's Pedernales River Chili
keywords: gluten-free, ground beef, tomato, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons chile powder, or to taste
2 to 6 dashes hot sauce, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the meat, onion and garlic in a Dutch oven over medium heat, stirring, until lightly browned. Stir in the oregano, cumin, chile powder, tomatoes, hot sauce, salt and 2 cups hot water. Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer, covered, for about 1 hour, skimming off the fat as it cooks.
